subtitle: chapter 12 I go unto the Father when we
consider the statement and greater

omit the second part of the statement
because I go unto the father although

work shall follow and we shall
understand presently the reason why
there are two interpretations that can

because while he was with them they

left upon their own individuality and

having in most instances never been

an awakened soul is not a mere

that
our advancement will be far greater and
